eu.casoftworks.jdroidlib.device.fs

Class AndroidFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.casoftworks.jdroidlib.device.fs.AndroidFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFile, IFileSystemEntry

    public class AndroidFile
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFile
    Represents a file stored on an Android Device. AndroidFiles may be instantiated by the library, but can also be used extensively in any applications using the library.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface eu.casoftworks.jdroidlib.interfaces.IFileSystemEntry

        CAT_CMD, CMD_ARG_DIR, CMD_ARG_FILE, CP_CMD, CURRENT_DIR, DIR_EXISTS_CMD, FILE_CMD, FILE_EXISTS_CMD, FILE_EXTENSION_PRECHAR, LINUX_PATH_SEPARATOR, LS_CMD, LS_OUTPUT_PATTERN, MKDIR_CMD, MV_CMD, NOT_AVAILABLE, OUTPUT_ERR, OUTPUT_FILE_EXISTS, OUTPUT_FILE_NOT_EXISTS, PARENT_DIR, PERMISSION_DENIED, PERMISSION_PATTERN, PULL_CMD, REMOVE_FORCE, REMOVE_RECURSE, RM_CMD, STAT_CMD, STAT_PERMS_ARGS, TOUCH_CMD

      • getContents

        public byte[] getContents()
                   throws DeviceException
        Attempts to get the file's contents. The file may be pulled to the host in order to retrieve the bytes! NOT RECOMMENDED FOR FILES > 30MiB!
